events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim categorised under Auto Accident after verification of incident details and keywords matched.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim filed by the customer regarding the car collision.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer received confirmation along with next steps.
Request sent for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license for processing the claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, aiding the efficient processing of the auto accident claim.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has begun, including contacting witnesses.
Investigation confirmed liability and damage extent consistent with the customer’s accident report.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering vehicle repairs and associated costs.
Customer expressed satisfaction with prompt processing and clarity of the proposed settlement terms.
Claim officially approved by the insurance company with agreed compensations for the auto accident damages.
Payment was issued to the customer’s account to cover the repair costs of the vehicle involved in the collision.
The auto accident claim has been closed following payment and resolution feedback from the customer.
All case files and communications related to the auto accident claim have been archived for record keeping.
